name: baby-buddy
description: Baby Buddy is a self-hosted parenting tracker for infants and toddlers. It allows logging feedings, sleep, diaper changes, developmental milestones, and more, with optional charts and statistics for deeper insights.
features: Parenting Tracker: Log feedings, sleep, and diaper changes. Complete baby care.
Feeding Logs: Track breastfeeding, bottle feeding, and solid foods. Detailed records.
Sleep Tracking: Monitor sleep patterns and schedules. Better rest.
Diaper Changes: Record diaper changes and patterns. Health monitoring.
Milestone Tracking: Document developmental milestones. Cherish memories.
Charts & Statistics: Visualize patterns and trends. Data-driven insights.
Multi-Child: Track multiple children from one account. Family-friendly.
Self-Hosted: Keep your family data completely private. Complete privacy.
